name: Nostalgiac Blues - Touhou Twinstick
description:
NOTE: the HTML5 version was uploaded more than a full day after the jam deadline passed. it's only provided for the sake of convenience. also, it freezes for a few seconds while the first level loads; this is normal.

this is a fanwork of the touhou project. original touhou games created by zun.

alice ruthlessly slaughters bakebakes while jumping on giant mushrooms for five minutes and then Things Happen except not a lot because this is a jam game

look it's an alice in wonderland joke ok that book was about a whole entire dream!!!

streaming etc completely OK

東方二次創作です。原作はZUN・上海アリス幻樂団より。

夢見るアリスはデカキノコからジャンプして化け化けをボコボコにして大事件が起こるというオチがないゲームジャムのゲーム

いや、だって不思議の国のアリスのネタだからね、キノコとか夢とか

※ゲーム内日本語対応はありません

source code: https://github.com/wareya/Nostalgiac-Blues

using cricket ambiance from https://opengameart.org/content/random-sounds-samples but nothing else
